author: Bloomberg News
title: Stocks stumble after 6.6 million U.S. jobless claims blow forecasts out of the water
description: 'The global economy has hit a wall'
content:
U.S. stocks fluctuated after a surge in unemployment claims underscored the pandemic’s dire toll on the world’s largest economy. Oil rallied after China unveiled plans to boost its reserves.
The S&P 500 Index opened mixed after futures erased overnight g… [+2033 chars]
